mapper.select: select id, name, `desc`, cate, price, image_src as imgSrc from goods;
select id, name, `desc`, cate, price, image_src as imgSrc from goods where id=#{id};
select id, name, `desc`, cate, price, image_src as imgSrc from goods where cate=#{cate};
select id, name, `desc`, cate, price, image_src as imgSrc from goods where name=#{name};
mapper.insert: insert into goods(name, desc, cate, price, image_src) values(#{name}, #{desc}, #{cate}, #{price}, #{image_src});
